name: fangminchina
short_description: We are one non-governmental organization which has not been registered because of the government's unwillingness and also one of the biggest political organizations in China now. Its Chinese name is Gongmeng which means an alliance of citizens who work together for public benefits. You can look up the attachment -brief introductions of Gongmeng for further information. Citizens Assistance is one branch of Gongmeng. It is mainly dedicated to helping those homeless petitioners and vagrants.
